metadata.title: Founders - Inteli - Institute of Technology and Leadership

content_blocks.text: A legacy for Brazil: from Brazilians to Brazilians.
content_blocks.section: A legacy for Brazil: from Brazilians to Brazilians.
A legacy for Brazil: from Brazilians to Brazilians.

content_blocks.text: We are Inteli, the Institute of Technology and Leadership, a non-profit college founded in 2019 by entrepreneurs André Esteves and Roberto Sallouti. Through philanthropy, the founders aim to create a cutting-edge institute in Brazil, recognized for its excellence and innovation. To train the future leaders who will transform Brazil through technology.
content_blocks.section: A legacy for Brazil: from Brazilians to Brazilians.

content_blocks.text: To be the best Technology Institute in Latin America with a project-based curriculum that combines Computing, Business and Leadership skills. Ethics, Sustainability, Rule of Law and Market Economy.
content_blocks.section: A legacy for Brazil: from Brazilians to Brazilians.
A legacy for Brazil: from Brazilians to Brazilians.

content_blocks.text: "Since 2019, Inteli has been the dream project of a team of nonconformists. Together, we took on the mission of creating from scratch a technology college committed to training the leaders of the future. We opened our campus in February 2022 and since then we've been celebrating many achievements. Inteli got off the ground and continues to grow, always committed to excellence and impact."
content_blocks.section: A legacy for Brazil: from Brazilians to Brazilians.
A legacy for Brazil: from Brazilians to Brazilians.
A legacy for Brazil: from Brazilians to Brazilians.

content_blocks.text: Chairman of BTG Pactual, Founding Partner of Inteli, Latin American Council of Harvard Business School. Lilian Esteves Entrepreneur and philanthropist who is an advisor to Inteli. Roberto Sallouti CEO of BTG Pactual and Chairman of the Boards of Inteli and Banco Pan. Pedro Thompson CEO of the Alliança Group and member of the Inteli Board. Silvio Meira Chief Scientist, TDS.company & Extraordinary Professor, CESAR.school Arthur Lazarte Co-founder and CEO of Wildlife and member of the Inteli Board. Mark Maletz
content_blocks.section: A legacy for Brazil: from Brazilians to Brazilians.

content_blocks.text: Senior Fellow at Harvard Business School, founder of the Corporate Performance Research Center, among others. Ricardo Dias Co-founder of Adventures, former CMO of Anheuser-Busch InBev, among others. Sofia Esteves
